info.description: Multi-tenant asset management and order fulfillment platform API documentation

CompanyHeader.name: X-Company
CompanyHeader.description: Optional company filter for operations API

tags.name: Platform Management
tags.description: Platform configuration and feature flags (Platform Admin only)

post.description: Logs in an user with email/contact number and password.

success.description: Indicates the success or failure of the operation

message.description: A message indicating the result of the operation

data.description: A JSON object representing the logged-in user.

400.description: If the request is invalid or missing required fields

403.description: If the email or password is incorrect

404.description: If the user is not exists

post.description: Creates a new company with a vanity subdomain. The platform ID is automatically extracted from the X-Platform header. Company domain must be unique within the platform.

domain.description: Company subdomain (lowercase, alphanumeric and hyphens only)

message.example: Domain must be lowercase and contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens
Only platform administrators can create companies

409.description: Conflict - Domain already exists for this platform

message.example: Company domain already exists for this platform

post.description: Creates a new platform instance with configuration and feature flags. This endpoint is restricted to super administrators only.

message.example: Only super administrators can create platforms

post.description: Creates a new user account with role-based access control. The platform ID is automatically extracted from the X-Platform header. Email must be unique per platform.

company.description: Company ID (required for CLIENT users, null for ADMIN/LOGISTICS)

password.description: User's password (will be hashed before storage)

permissions.description: Array of specific permissions granted to the user

isActive.description: Whether the user account is active

409.description: Conflict - Email already exists for this platform

message.example: Email already exists for this platform

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users for the platform. Supports filtering by role, status, company, search term, and date range. Requires ADMIN role authentication.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: Search term to filter users by name or email (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Filter by user role (comma-separated for multiple roles)

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Filter users created from this date (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Filter users created until this date (ISO 8601 format)
